# Onis
Large, horned people that come in a variety of colors. Their accuracy with guns is terrible, but their physical strength brings them a lot of boons both in and out of combat.
## Diet - Just about anything. Can even eat many things raw.
## Benefits - Does more damage in melee; 10% more Blunt, Slash, Piece, Stamina, and Structural damage. - Due to their big size, they can easily carry and pull any other species, they also have stronger shoves and grabs.
## Drawbacks - Oni are unable to fire any weapons with accuracy, with reports of bullets managing to fire even behind them - They are harder to carry and pull. - They are bigger than Humans, making them easier to hit.
